# LunesPy

ðŸ“¦ Library for communication with nodes in mainnet or testnet of the lunes-blockchain network Allows the automation of sending assets, issue end reissue tokens, leasing, registry, and create new wallet.

## How to install

```
pip install lunespy
```

```
poetry add lunespy
```

- see the docs: [Telescope](https://lunes-platform.github.io/telescope)
